articles.title: Slavia’s Ondrej Kudela gets 10-match Uefa ban for ‘racist behaviour’ at Rangers
articles.description: Slavia Prague’s Ondrej Kudela has been banned for 10 matches by Uefa after being found guilty of racist behaviour towards Rangers’ Glen Kamara
articles.content:
Slavia Prague’s Ondrej Kudela has been banned for 10 matches by Uefa after being found guilty of racist behaviour towards Rangers’ Glen Kamara at Ibrox in the Europa League last month.

articles.title: O'Donovan and McCarthy impress as two boats make finals
articles.description: Paul O'Donovan and Fintan McCarthy in the men's and Aoife Casey and Margaret Cremen in the women's progressed to the final of the lightweight double sculls at the European Rowing Championships in Varese, Italy.
articles.content:
